name: Chikipi Poultry
description: ChickenPal meat.Light and easy to eat,it's a local favorite for residents of Palpagos Island.

name: Lamball Mutton
description: SheepBall meat.Red meat with a unique flavor.Delicious, but takes some getting used to.

name: Raw Kelpsea
description: Kelpie meat.Tender and slightly sweet.Fish meat tends to spoil quickly.

name: Galeclaw Poultry
description: Eagle meat.Full of nutrition, its flavor packs a punch.

name: Rushoar Pork
description: Boar meat.Full of the delicious flavors of wild game.Juicy and nutritious.

name: Raw Dumud
description: LazyCatfish meat.Fatty with a rich taste.Has a mouthwatering plump texture.

name: Eikthyrdeer Venison
description: Deer meat.Light and lean, but rich in flavor.

name: Reindrix Venison
description: IceDeer meat.Strange venison capable of remaining at low temperatures.Takes a very long time to spoil.

name: Caprity Meat
description: BerryGoat meat.Healthy and full of nutrients.Hints of berries scenting the meat stimulates the appetite.

name: Mozzarina Meat
description: CowPal meat.Thick, juicy and marbled.Residents of Palpagos Island cherish it above all other meats.

name: Broncherry Meat
description: SakuraSaurus meat.Giant meat full of massive stores of energy.Stuffed to the brim with nutrients gathered through photosynthesis.

name: Mammorest Meat
description: GrassMammoth meat.With massive size comes massive flavor.Its overwhelming portions are sure to satisfy any glutton.

name: Grilled Chikipi
description: Chicken skewer slow-grilled over a charcoal fire.Light and refreshing on the tongue.

name: Lamball Kebab
description: Spiced and roasted mutton.Deeply complex with unique flavors.

name: Grilled Kelpsea
description: Fresh fish grilled over a charcoal fire.Plump and juicy.

name: Grilled Galeclaw
description: Grilled meat full of vitality for flying high in the skies.

name: Roast Rushoar
description: Boar grilled over a hearty flame.Crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside.Perfect as an extravagant main dish for a big party.

name: Broiled Dumud
description: Grilled fish slathered with a secret sauce.Soothes both mind and body.Perfect for tired Pal Tamers.

name: Roast Eikthyrdeer
description: Carefully roasted venison with delicate flavor notes accentedby the aromas of the deep forest.Elegant taste for an elegant lifestyle.

name: Roast Reindrix
description: When taken from a flame, Reindrix meat rapidly drops in temperature.This allows it to retain freshness for long periods of time,making it a perfect emergency ration.

name: Herb Roasted Caprity
description: Mild roast filled with the natural aromas ofherbs and berries embedded in the meat.Gives a pleasant sense of warmth when eaten outdoors.

name: Mozzarina Steak
description: Thick, well-done steak.Strong flavors give those who eat it an energy boost.

name: Broncherry Rib Roast
description: Grilled meat brimming with the flavor of the king of the wilds.Juices from the compressed meat flow from the bone,making it surprisingly tender despite the initial toughness.

name: Mammorest Steak
description: Boasts a rich and dignified flavor.Memories of glaciers and deep forests come rushing back with every bite.

name: Chikipi Sauté
description: Plump poultry sautéed in butter.Accented with fresh lemons.Eat to slightly increase work speed for a period of time.

name: Herb Roasted Lamball
description: Indulges in an abundance of fresh berriesto create a tantalizing aroma that accentuates the unique flavor of mutton.Eat to increase COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE by +10% for a period of time.

name: Grilled Lamball
description: Marinated mutton slow cooked over a grill.Eat to slightly increase work speedand make SAN decrease slightly slower for a period of time.

name: Stewed Galeclaw
description: Slow-cooked dish that exudes a burst of rich, wild flavors.Eat to make SAN decrease slightly slower for a period of time.

name: Rushoar Bacon 'n' Eggs
description: The smoky essence of bacon intertwines flawlesslywith the gentle texture of eggs, creating a sublime harmony of flavors.Eat to increase COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK by +10% for a period of time.

name: Reindrix Stew
description: Stewed vegetables and venison reared in a frigid environment.The meat's soft texture melts away to reveal a delicate sweetness.Eat to stay full slightly longer for a period of time.

name: Fried Chikipi
description: Magnificently juicy poultry.Eat to increase work speedand make SAN decrease slower for a period of time.

name: Rushoar Hot Dog
description: Thick sausage wedged between warm buns.The crisply seared meat and spicy flavors are to die for.Eat to increase COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE by +20% for a period of time.

name: Eikthyrdeer Loco Moco
description: Thick hamburger steak accented with a creamy fried egg.This sublime combination brings pure joy to the mouths of those who eat it.Eat to increase COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK by +20% for a period of time.

name: Eikthyrdeer Stew
description: A tender, melt-in-your-mouth venison stew crafted with love.The intertwining flavors of vegetables and meat create a harmonious blend that brings out a comforting richness.Eat to increase COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE by +20% for a period of time.

name: Mozzarina Hamburger
description: The rich flavor of beef melds with the sweetness of the buns in perfect harmony in this masterpiece.Eat to increase work speedand make SAN decrease slightly slower for a period of time.

name: Mozzarina Cheeseburger
description: Now with cheese, this dish has reached the highest level of fine cuisine.Eat to increase COMMON_STATUS_RANGE_ATTACK by +20%and stay full longer for a period of time.

name: Fried Kelpsea
description: Crunchy fried batter perfectly accentuates the Kelpsea's plumpness.Eat to increase COMMON_STATUS_DEFENCE by +10%and make SAN decrease slower for a period of time.

name: Dumud Chowder
description: Dumud lavishly covered in a thick, creamy soup.Eat to increase work speedand stay full slightly longer for a period of time.
